entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 17.
